actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Army to make available to the State of Hawaii, through it to the Queen's Medical Center, physical facilities not needed by the Army at Fort DeRussy, Hawaii, for the purposes of establishing a mental health clinic in such facilities.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Army to make available to the State of Hawaii, or through it to the Queen's Medical Center, physical facilities not needed by the Army at Fort DeRussy, Hawaii, for the purpose of establishing a mental health clinic in such facilities.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Army to make available to the State of Hawaii, through it to the Queen's Medical Center, physical facilities not needed by the Army at Fort DeRussy, Hawaii, for the purposes of establishing a mental health clinic in such facilities.
